Items.Title: Oversight - Electoral Reform in New York City
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Electoral Reform in New York City

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to amending the New York City Pro-Voter Law by mandating annual training for agencies, verbal assistance for the public and agency transmission of registration forms.
Items.MatterName: Amending the NYC Pro-Voter Law by mandating annual training for agencies, verbal assistance for the public and agency transmission of registration forms.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to mandating that Borough Presidents provide training to community board members and staff on their obligations to comply with the New York City Pro-Voter Law.
Items.MatterName: Mandating that Borough Presidents provide training to community board members and staff on their obligations to comply with the NYC Pro-Voter Law.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York City Administrative Code, in relation to creating a Referenda Finance Program within the current Campaign Finance Program.
Items.MatterName: Creating a Referenda Finance Program within the current Campaign Finance Program.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to providing for reasonable reimbursement to participants in the Campaign Finance Program for costs associated with post-election audits.
Items.MatterName: Providing for reimbursement to participants in the Campaign Finance Program for costs associated with post-election audits.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to including candidates for justice of the supreme court, surrogate’s court or civil court in the New York City voluntary Campaign Finance Program.
Items.MatterName: Including candidates for justice of the supreme court, surrogate's court or civil court in the NYC voluntary Campaign Finance Program.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the requirements of the campaign finance program for city elections.
Items.MatterName: Requirements of the campaign finance program for city elections.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the composition of the Voter Assistance Commission.
Items.MatterName: Composition of the Voter Assistance Commission.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to creating orderly and responsible timeframes and paths of communication between the Campaign Finance Board and the candidates that participate in the system.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Creating timeframes and paths of communication between the Campaign Finance Board and the candidates that participate in the system.
